INSERT INTO ASS_TRAN_DEPT_Other (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
tran_no ,
out_dept_id ,
out_dept_no ,
in_dept_id ,
in_dept_no ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
state ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{tran_no} ,
#{out_dept_id} ,
#{out_dept_no} ,
#{in_dept_id} ,
#{in_dept_no} ,
#{create_emp} ,
to_date(#{create_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
#{state} ,
#{note}

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.tran_no, a.out_dept_id, a.out_dept_no, d1.dept_code out_dept_code, d1.dept_name out_dept_name, a.in_dept_id, a.in_dept_no, d2.dept_code in_dept_code, d2.dept_name in_dept_name, a.create_emp, su1.user_name create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, su2.user_name audit_emp_name, a.audit_date, a.state, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '移库确认' else '' end state_name, a.note FROM ass_tran_dept_Other a left join hos_dept_dict d1 on a.group_id = d1.group_id and a.hos_id = d1.hos_id and a.out_dept_id = d1.dept_id and d1.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict d2 on a.group_id = d2.group_id and a.hos_id = d2.hos_id and a.in_dept_id = d2.dept_id and d2.is_stop = 0
left join sys_user su1 on a.group_id = su1.group_id and a.hos_id = su1.hos_id and a.create_emp = su1.user_id
left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su2.user_id
WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code} and a.tran_no = #{tran_no}

SELECT a.tran_no ID, a.tran_no, a.out_dept_id, a.out_dept_no, d1.dept_code out_dept_code, d1.dept_name out_dept_name, a.in_dept_id, a.in_dept_no, d2.dept_code in_dept_code, d2.dept_name in_dept_name, su1.user_name create_emp, to_char(a.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as create_date, su2.user_name audit_emp, to_char(a.audit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as audit_date, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '移库确认' else '' end state, a.note, to_char(sum(acs.price),'FM999,999,990.00') sum_price, sum(acs.ass_amount) sum_amount FROM ASS_TRAN_DEPT_Other a left join hos_dept_dict d1 on a.group_id = d1.group_id and a.hos_id = d1.hos_id and a.out_dept_id = d1.dept_id and d1.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict d2 on a.group_id = d2.group_id and a.hos_id = d2.hos_id and a.in_dept_id = d2.dept_id and d2.is_stop = 0
left join sys_user su1 on a.group_id = su1.group_id and a.hos_id = su1.hos_id and a.create_emp = su1.user_id
left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su2.user_id
left join ASS_TRAN_DEPT_DETAIL_Other aa on aa.group_id = a.group_id and aa.hos_id = a.hos_id and aa.copy_code = a.copy_code and aa.tran_no = a.tran_no
left join ass_card_Other acs on acs.group_id = aa.group_id and acs.hos_id = aa.hos_id and acs.copy_code = aa.copy_code and acs.ass_card_no = aa.ass_card_no
WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.tran_no in (${paraId})
group by a.tran_no, a.tran_no, a.out_dept_id, a.out_dept_no, d1.dept_code, d1.dept_name, a.in_dept_id, a.in_dept_no, d2.dept_code, d2.dept_name, su1.user_name, a.create_date, su2.user_name, a.audit_date, a.state, a.note
order by a.create_date desc

left join ass_card_Other acs on acs.group_id = aa.group_id and acs.hos_id = aa.hos_id and acs.copy_code = aa.copy_code and acs.ass_card_no = aa.ass_card_no
WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.tran_no = #{tran_no}
group by a.tran_no, a.tran_no, a.out_dept_id, a.out_dept_no, d1.dept_code, d1.dept_name, a.in_dept_id, a.in_dept_no, d2.dept_code, d2.dept_name, su1.user_name, a.create_date, su2.user_name, a.audit_date, a.state, a.note
